intro: Ouratea newiensis, commonly known as the New Guinea ouratea, is a flowering plant native to the rainforests of New Guinea. The plant produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in umbels, adding a delicate ornamental quality. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species in its native habitat.
